comment:
* An instance of this class represents a connection to the surface
 * flinger, from which you can create one or more Surface instances that will
 * be composited to the screen.
 * {@hide}

variables.name: mNativeClient
variables.comment: Note: This field is accessed by native code.

methods.name: private static native void nativeDestroy(long ptr)
private static native void nativeKill(long ptr)
public void kill()
methods.comment:
* Forcibly detach native resources associated with this object.
     * Unlike destroy(), after this call any surfaces that were created
     * from the session will no longer work.

methodNames: private static native void nativeDestroy(long ptr)
private static native void nativeKill(long ptr)
